resources.string:
PRIVACY POLICY
 The DataGather Android App is for data collection purposes only.
 The DataGather Android App collects GPS data, positional data, light sensor data, and other related data only.
 The type of data collected is solely at the discretion of the user.
 The user has the right to delete the DataGather Android App at any time and avoid future data collection.
 Collected data is made public, specifically to the students and staff at the University of New Mexico and Arizona State University.
 
 If we decide to change this privacy policy we will post the changes here.
 This policy was last modified March 11, 2015.
 
 Contact us: andrea@andreapolli.com
 
 DISCLAIMER
 This is an educational and experimental prototype. All data collection is worked on by the students of UNMâ€™s Social Media Workgroup and courses (socialmedia.carc.unm.edu). 
 Prototypes by definition are unfinished products. Any feedback is much appreciated.
